0.text: Innate: Irelia generates a stack of Ionian Fervor for each enemy champion hit by her abilities, or if she hits at least one non-champion, lasting for 6 seconds, refreshing on basic attacks and ability hits against enemy  champions and large  monsters, and stacking up to 4 times.
0.html: Innate: Irelia generates a stack of Ionian Fervor for each enemy champion hit by her abilities, or if she hits at least one non-champion, lasting for 6 seconds, refreshing on basic attacks and ability hits against enemy champions and large monsters, and stacking up to 4 times.
markedPassages: champions
monsters

1.text: Ionian Fervor: For each stack, Irelia gains 7.5% − 20% (based on level)  bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 30% − 80% (based on level). At maximum stacks, Irelia's basic attacks are empowered to deal 10 − 61 (based on level) (+ 20% bonus AD) bonus magic damage  on-hit.
1.html: Ionian Fervor: For each stack, Irelia gains 7.5% − 20% (based on level)  bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 30% − 80% (based on level). At maximum stacks, Irelia's basic attacks are empowered to deal 10 − 61 (based on level) (+ 20% bonus AD) bonus magic damage on-hit.

1.text: 30% − 80% (based on level)

2.text: Innate - Unsteady: Enemy  champions and large  monsters hit by  Flawless Duet and  Vanguard's Edge's initial barrage are marked as Unsteady for 5 seconds. The mark can be consumed by  Bladesurge.
2.html: Innate - Unsteady: Enemy champions and large monsters hit by Flawless Duet and Vanguard's Edge's initial barrage are marked as Unsteady for 5 seconds. The mark can be consumed by Bladesurge.

0.text: Active: Irelia  dashes 100 units through the target enemy's location, and upon collision or dash completion, she deals physical damage, applies  on-hit effects, and  heals herself. Bladesurge deals 55 − 259 (based on level) bonus physical damage to  minions.
0.html: Active: Irelia dashes 100 units through the target enemy's location, and upon collision or dash completion, she deals physical damage, applies on-hit effects, and heals herself. Bladesurge deals 55 − 259 (based on level) bonus physical damage to minions.

on-hit

minions

1.text: Bladesurge's  current cooldown is reduced to 0.2 seconds upon collision of targets marked as  Unsteady, and is reset if the target dies to or during Bladesurge's dash.
1.html: Bladesurge's  current cooldown is reduced to 0.2 seconds upon collision of targets marked as Unsteady, and is reset if the target dies to or during Bladesurge's dash.

Unsteady

2.text: Flawless Duet can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Flawless Duet can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Flawless Duet
possibleConcerningAbilities: Flawless Duet can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Irelia  charges for up to 1.5 seconds, during which she increases Defiant Dance's damage over the first 0.75 seconds of the channel and reduces incoming physical damage by 40% − 70% (based on level) (+ 7% per 100 AP) and incoming magic damage by 20% − 35% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP).
0.html: Active: Irelia charges for up to 1.5 seconds, during which she increases Defiant Dance's damage over the first 0.75 seconds of the channel and reduces incoming physical damage by 40% − 70% (based on level) (+ 7% per 100 AP) and incoming magic damage by 20% − 35% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP).

1.text: 20% − 35% (based on level)

markedPassages: charges

1.text: Defiant Dance can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards. Defiant Dance's charge cannot be  interrupted by  crowd control.
1.html: Defiant Dance can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards. Defiant Dance's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.
markedPassages: interrupted
crowd control

2.text: Recast: Irelia swipes her blades in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies around her and within a line, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time). She also retains the damage reduction for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: Recast: Irelia swipes her blades in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies around her and within a line, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time). She also retains the damage reduction for 0.5 seconds.

3.text: Defiant Dance's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control. If  Ionian Fervor would expire during the charge, it will instead refresh every 0.25 seconds for the remaining charge and be retained for 0.5 seconds after the recast is initiated.
3.html: Defiant Dance's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control. If Ionian Fervor would expire during the charge, it will instead refresh every 0.25 seconds for the remaining charge and be retained for 0.5 seconds after the recast is initiated.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
Ionian Fervor
possibleConcerningAbilities: Defiant Dance's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control. If  Ionian Fervor would expire during the charge, it will instead refresh every 0.25 seconds for the remaining charge and be retained for 0.5 seconds after the recast is initiated.

0.text: Active: Irelia sends a blade to the target location for 3.5 seconds. Flawless Duet can be recast after 0.15 seconds while the blade is active, and does so automatically at the end of its duration, though not if she is unable to cast abilities.
0.html: Active: Irelia sends a blade to the target location for 3.5 seconds. Flawless Duet can be recast after 0.15 seconds while the blade is active, and does so automatically at the end of its duration, though not if she is unable to cast abilities.

1.text: Recast: Irelia sends a second blade to the target location, or to her current position if Flawless Duet was recast automatically.
1.html: Recast: Irelia sends a second blade to the target location, or to her current position if Flawless Duet was recast automatically.

2.text: Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other regardless of distance and converge over 0.25 seconds, afterwards dealing magic damage to all enemies within a line between them and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
2.html: Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other regardless of distance and converge over 0.25 seconds, afterwards dealing magic damage to all enemies within a line between them and stunning them for 0.75 seconds, during which they are revealed.
markedPassages: stunning
revealed

3.text: Flawless Duet's recast can be used during  Bladesurge and the cast time of  Vanguard's Edge. Each of the blades' travel times are 0.264 seconds. Flawless Duet will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Flawless Duet's recast can be used during Bladesurge and the cast time of Vanguard's Edge. Each of the blades' travel times are 0.264 seconds. Flawless Duet will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Bladesurge
Vanguard's Edge
possibleConcerningAbilities: Flawless Duet's recast can be used during  Bladesurge and the cast time of  Vanguard's Edge. Each of the blades' travel times are 0.264 seconds. Flawless Duet will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

1.text: COOLDOWN: 140 / 120 / 100

0.text: Passive:  Bladesurge's  total cooldown is reduced by a flat amount.
0.html: Passive: Bladesurge's  total cooldown is reduced by a flat amount.
markedPassages: Bladesurge's
total cooldown

1.text: Active: Irelia launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and  revealing them for 1 second.
1.html: Active: Irelia launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and revealing them for 1 second.
markedPassages: revealing

2.text: After expanding, the blades drop on the ground, knocking all enemy units away from them, though not rendering them  airborne, and forming a spade-shaped perimeter around the enemy champion hit for 2.5 seconds that grants  sight of its surroundings. Enemies that pass through the blades for the first time are dealt the same magic damage and are  slowed by 90% for 1.5 seconds.
2.html: After expanding, the blades drop on the ground, knocking all enemy units away from them, though not rendering them airborne, and forming a spade-shaped perimeter around the enemy champion hit for 2.5 seconds that grants sight of its surroundings. Enemies that pass through the blades for the first time are dealt the same magic damage and are slowed by 90% for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: airborne
sight
slowed

3.text: The perimeter will point at the same angle Irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.
3.html: The perimeter will point at the same angle Irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.
possibleConcerningAbilities: The perimeter will point at the same angle Irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.

textContent.text: The perimeter will point at the same angle Irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.
textContent.html: The perimeter will point at the same angle Irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.
possibleConcerningAbilities: The perimeter will point at the same angle Irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.

concerningSkills.skillName: the perimeter will point at the same angle irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.

1.concerningText: Active: Irelia  dashes 100 units through the target enemy's location, and upon collision or dash completion, she deals physical damage, applies  on-hit effects, and  heals herself. Bladesurge deals 55 − 259 (based on level) bonus physical damage to  minions.

Active: Irelia  dashes 100 units through the target enemy's location, and upon collision or dash completion, she deals physical damage, applies  on-hit effects, and  heals herself. Bladesurge deals 55 − 259 (based on level) bonus physical damage to  minions.

2.concerningText: Recast: Irelia swipes her blades in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies around her and within a line, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time). She also retains the damage reduction for 0.5 seconds.

Recast: Irelia swipes her blades in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies around her and within a line, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time). She also retains the damage reduction for 0.5 seconds.

3.concerningText: Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other regardless of distance and converge over 0.25 seconds, afterwards dealing magic damage to all enemies within a line between them and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds, during which they are  revealed.

4.concerningText: Passive:  Bladesurge's  total cooldown is reduced by a flat amount.
Active: Irelia launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and  revealing them for 1 second.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% / 9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 40 − 103 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (30 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% /  9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+20% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance
+7% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus attack damage and 70 bonus health.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 50% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on  shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
